title: Manage Custody Transfer Measurement
description: An operator at a pipeline delivery point manages a custody transfer, where ownership of the oil passes from the pipeline to the refinery. Accurate measurement is critical.

tasks.description: Verify that the custody transfer meter (e.g., a Coriolis meter) has a valid and current calibration certificate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the meter is in calibration.

tasks.description: Monitor the flow rate, temperature, and density in real-time during the transfer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The transfer is monitored to ensure stable conditions for accurate measurement.

tasks.description: At the end of the transfer, generate a custody transfer ticket that shows the total net volume transferred, which is used for billing.
tasks.expected_outcome: An official, auditable ticket is generated with the final measured volume.
